 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָגַר‎</span> **verb** ==pour, flow, run== (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be long*** (of time), Aph\`el ***prolong, potract***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְגַר‎</span> ***endure, flow, stream***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגְּרָה‎</span> [[Ps.77.3|Ps 77:3]]; [[Lam.3.49|Lam 3:49]] **Participle** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגָּרִים‎</span> [[2Sam.14.14|2Sam 14:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגָּרוֺת‎</span> [[Job.20.28|Job 20:28]] — 

**1.** ***be poured, spilt***, [[2Sam.14.14|2Sam 14:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמַּיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֻגָּרִים אַרְצָה‎</span> in simile of mortality). 

**2.** ***pour oneself, flow, trickle***, of eye (in tears) [[Lam.3.49|Lam 3:49]]. 

**3.** figurative ***vanish***, [[Job.20.28|Job 20:28]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּלָה‎</span>). 

**4.** ***be stretched out (?)*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדִי לַיְלָה נִגְּרָה‎</span> [[Ps.77.3|Ps 77:3]] (or read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינִי‎</span> ?). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִגַּרְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Mic.1.6|Mic 1:6]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּגֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.75.9|Ps 75:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּגֵּר‎</span> [[Ezek.35.5|Ezek 35:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַגִּירֻ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Ps.63.11|Ps 63:11]] ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגִּרֵם‎</span> [[Jer.18.21|Jer 18:21]] — ***pour down, hurl down*** the stones of Samaria, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Mic.1.6|Mic 1:6]] ***pour out***, figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s wine-cup, [[Ps.75.9|Ps 75:9]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליְֿדֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶ֫רֶב‎</span> = ***deliver over to*** [[Jer.18.21|Jer 18:21]]; [[Ps.63.11|Ps 63:11]]; [[Ezek.35.5|Ezek 35:5]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמַיִם מֻגָּרִים בְּמוֺרָד‎</span> [[Mic.1.4|Mic 1:4]] (in simile, of mountains melting at theophany.
